title: The Amazing Race NUDE photos: Tim and Rod laid bare
text:
The Amazing Race is set to premiere on Monday night, after five years off the air.

And just hours before its return to the small screen, two of the show's participants have found themselves a little overexposed on social media.

Pictures of NSW contestants Tim, 29, and Rod, 28, posing naked in a variety of strange positions have surfaced online.

Dare to bare! Just hours before the season premiere of The Amazing Race, two of the show's participants, Tim and Rod, have found themselves a little overexposed on social media

As first reported by NW magazine, the gay newlyweds would regularly flash the flesh on Instagram before signing up for The Amazing Race.

In fact, their social media accounts were apparently even ruder before Channel 10's publicity department told them to 'tone it down'.

But despite the boys' efforts to scrub clean their Instagram pages, some of their racier snaps are still being circulated online.

Naughty boys! As first reported by NW magazine, the gay newlyweds would regularly flash the flesh on Instagram before signing up for The Amazing Race

There's no suggestion Tim and Rod are embarrassed by their old photos, which are camp and fun in nature, rather than sexually explicit.

In fact, the boys proudly told NW: 'We're fun, fit, passionate and spontaneous.'

In one particular image, the pair can be seen posing nude on a beach with their bottoms touching while a rainbow emerges in the background.

Steady on, lads! Tim and Rod's social media accounts were apparently even ruder before Channel 10's publicity department told them to 'tone it down'

The Amazing Race follows 11 teams-of-two as they travel the world and compete for a $250,000 cash prize.

The competitive game show will be hosted by retired NRL star Beau Ryan, who is replacing former presenter Grant Bowler.

The Amazing Race premieres Monday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: The Amazing Race is set to premiere on  Monday night, after five years off the air.
authors: Joe Scek For Daily Mail Australia
